title: Disconnect During Loading Screen & the game was a remake, so it went down as a loss!!!
body: Yo riot, what the hell is this?!?!?! I got disconnected during the loading screen 2 times in the last 2 days now, but today it was during a ranked game and in my freakin placements to add to it all!!!! It went down as a loss!!! PLS HELP!!!!

replies.body: Which specific error message did you see in the loading screen? This wasn't the [**known issue**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) that has been going on for a few days?
And now it won't even let me freakin play anymore, srsly, what the hell is this bs riot
